en.RC_IDC_PSASOURCE_S_NUMPAR: Number of particles to spawn on demand (required if Emitter Rate = 0):
en.RC_IDC_PSASINK_S_AGE_HELP: Enter maximum age or minimum speed of particle for death to occur.
en.RC_IDC_PSASINK_S_AGE_HELP2: In both cases -1 means not in use.
en.RC_IDC_PSABARR_S_HELP: Adds a barrier against which particles can react.
en.RC_IDC_PSATINT_S_HELP: Select a Tint Swab to Modify:
en.RC_IDC_PSATINT_S_HELP2: Visual particle systems require that the visual's material support the "ParticleMeshTint" constant.
en.RC_IDC_PSATINT_S_HELP3: Apply a colour tint to particles.
en.RC_IDC_PSPROP_S_PROPS: General properties of a particle sub-system.
en.RC_IDC_PSAFORCE_S_HELP: Apply a directional force to the particles.
en.RC_IDC_PSASTREAM_S_HELP:
This creates a stream effect in the direction and magnitude given by the stream direction.
The halflife refers to the time taken to converge on the stream (-1 for no halflife).
Drag can be simulated by setting the stream direction to (0, 0, 0).
en.RC_IDC_PSASCALER_S_HELP: Scale the particle size over time.
en.RC_IDC_PSAORBIT_S_HELP: Create an axis around which the particles orbit.
en.RC_IDC_PSAMAGNET_S_HELP: Add a particle magnet located at the origin. The magnet's effect is inversely proportional to its distance from the particle.
en.RC_IDC_PSAJITTER_S_HELP: Add a jitter to all the particles. This adds a random change to the position and velocity of all the particles each frame.
en.RC_IDC_PSACOLLIDE_S_HELP: Specify how the particles should react when they collide with either the floor or an object.
en.RC_IDC_PSAMATSWA_S_HELP: The MatrixSwarm effect allows particles to be attached to a node or a list of nodes. This involves writing Python scripts in the game, in order to attach this sub-system correctly.
en.RC_IDC_PSAMATSWA_S_HELP2: Adding a MatrixSwarm component in Particle Editor exposes the functionality in the game script.
en.RC_IDC_PSA_NODECLAMP_S_HELP: The Node Clamp component is used to determine that the generated particles should be clamped to the origin of the particle subsystem There are no settings for this component.
en.RC_IDC_PSA_SPLAT_S_HELP: Splats collided particles on the collision scene. There are no options for this selection.
en.RC_SHADER_LOADING_STATIC: Shaders are compiling, this may take a few minutes. NOTE: This only occurs if shaders have been changed.
en.RCS_IDS_BARRIER_DESC: Barrier against which particles bounce or die.
en.RCS_IDS_JITTER_DESC: Add random change to pos. or velocity.
en.RCS_IDS_ORBIT_DESC: Set axis around which particles orbit.
en.RCS_IDS_COLLIDE_DESC: Collide against ground and other objects.
en.RCS_IDS_MATRIXSWARM_DESC: Attach particles to a list of model nodes.
en.RCS_IDS_MAGNET_DESC: Particles become attracted to a magnet.
en.RCS_IDS_SPLAT_DESC: Splats particles onto the collision scene.
en.RCS_ID_FILE_SAVE_AS: Save the active document with a new name Save As
en.RCS_ID_APP_ABOUT: Display program information, version number and copyright About
en.RCS_ID_APP_EXIT: Quit the application; prompts to save documents Exit
en.RCS_ID_NEXT_PANE: Switch to the next window pane Next Pane
en.RCS_ID_PREV_PANE: Switch back to the previous window pane Previous Pane
en.RCS_ID_WINDOW_SPLIT: Split the active window into panes Split
en.RCS_ID_EDIT_COPY: Copy the selection and put it on the Clipboard Copy
en.RCS_ID_EDIT_CUT: Cut the selection and put it on the Clipboard Cut
en.RCS_ID_EDIT_FIND: The Visual Exporter exported visual file to draw the mesh particles. You can drag and drop visuals from the asset locator.
en.RCS_ID_EDIT_REPLACE: Replace specific text with different text Replace
en.RCS_ID_EDIT_SELECT_ALL: Select the entire document Select All
en.RCS_ID_EDIT_REDO: Redo the previously undone action Redo
en.RCS_ID_VIEW_TOOLBAR: Show or hide the toolbar Toggle ToolBar
en.RCS_ID_VIEW_STATUS_BAR: Show or hide the status bar Toggle StatusBar
en.RCS_AFX_IDS_SCMINIMIZE: Reduce the window to an icon
en.RCS_AFX_IDS_SCMAXIMIZE: Enlarge the window to full size
en.RCS_AFX_IDS_SCNEXTWINDOW: Switch to the next document window
en.RCS_AFX_IDS_SCPREVWINDOW: Switch to the previous document window
en.RCS_AFX_IDS_SCCLOSE: Close the active window and prompts to save the documents
en.RCS_AFX_IDS_SCRESTORE: Restore the window to normal size
en.RCS_IDS_CONFIRMDELETE_PS: This will remove the particle system permanently. Are you sure you wish to do this?
en.RCS_ID_COLORBUTTON_ALPHA: Change the alpha of this tab
en.RCS_ID_COLORBUTTON_COLOR: Change the colour of this tab
en.RCS_IDS_INVALIDNAME: The name contains invalid characters. Characters such as "/<>?*:." are not allowed and the name cannot begin with a number.
en.RCS_ID_APP_KEY_CUTS: Show the keyboard shortcuts for Particle Editor Keyboard Shortcuts
en.RCS_IDS_BADPARTICLEFILE: The file %0 could not be loaded as a particle system.
en.RCS_ID_BUTTON_VIEW_X: Look at Y-Z Plane Look at Y-Z Plane
en.RCS_ID_BUTTON_VIEW_Y: Look At X-Z Plane Look At X-Z Plane
en.RCS_ID_BUTTON_VIEW_Z: Look At X-Y Plane Look At X-Y Plane
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_FLARE_FLARENAME_DIRECTORY_BT: Browse for a new folder from which to get texture files.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_COLLIDE_SOUND_TAG_DIRECTORY_: Browse for a folder containing sound files.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_AMP_TEXTURENAME_DIRE: Browse for a folder containing amp textures.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_TRAIL_TEXTURENAME_DI: Browse for a folder containing trail textures.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_CAPACITY: Maximum number of particles to be generated by the system.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_WINDHALFLIFE: Effect of wind on the particle system (0 none..1 full).
en.RCS_IDC_PS_MAXLOD: Furthest distance from camera for which the particle system will still be drawn.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_TINTSHADER_PERIOD: Duration for the tint transition process.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_TINTSHADER_REPEAT: Indicates that the tint transition process should be continuously applied to the particle subsystem.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_SLEEPPERIOD_MAX: Maximum time for inactivity. If Min is set to zero, and Max is set to -1,then particles will be continuously generated. If Max is set to -1, then only the Min value is used.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_SPRITE_INITORIENT: Inclination to apply to the particles (in degrees).
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_SPRITE_SPINRATE: Number of revolutions per second to apply to the particles.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_SPRITE_INITORIENT_RAN: Maximum value to be used for randomising the particles' inclination.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_SPRITE_SPINRATE_RAND: Maximum value to be used for randomising the particles' spin rate.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_RANDOM_SPIN: Indicates that the mesh-based particles should revolve randomly.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_POSITION_GENERATOR_X: From x coordinate of the initial point of the position generator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_POSITION_GENERATOR_Y: From y coordinate of the initial point of the position generator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_POSITION_GENERATOR_Z: From z coordinate of the initial point of the position generator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_VELOCITY_GENERATOR_X: From x coordinate of the initial point of the velocity generator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_VELOCITY_GENERATOR_Y: From y coordinate of the initial point of the velocity generator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_VELOCITY_GENERATOR_Z: From z coordinate of the initial point of the velocity generator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_SENSITIVITY: How quickly the particles are released with motion, measured in metres per particle.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_ACTIVEPERIOD: Period during which new particles will be generated.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_SLEEPPERIOD: Minimum time for inactivity. If Min is set to zero, and Max is set to -1,then particles will be continuously generated. If Max is set to -1, then only the Min value is used.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_MINIMUMSIZE: Minimum value of randomly sized particle.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_MAXIMUMSIZE: Maximum value of randomly sized particle.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_FORCEDUNITSIZE: Number of particles to create, for non-continuous emitters.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_ALLOWEDTIME: Time (in seconds) allowed for the creation of particles. (This feature is only active in game)
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_MAXSPEED: The maximum speed at which the particle system can be moving and still produce particles (0 - disabled).
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SINK_MAXIMUMAGE: Maximum lifetime (in seconds) of each particle.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SINK_MINIMUMSPEED: Minimum speed (in metres per second) that the particles may have before being removed.
en.RCS_PSA_SINK_OUTSIDE_ONLY: These particles are destroyed when they move into an inside chunk.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_MESH_VISUALNAME_DIRE: Browse for a folder containing meshes.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_TINTSHADER_DELETETINT: Deletes the Time Point currently selected in the Tint Timeline.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_FLARE_FLARENAME: The flare effect on the particles.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_SPRITE_TEXTURENAME: List of files in the specified folder, and that are relevant to the specified renderer. You can drag and drop BMP, TGA, DDS and Texanim files from the asset locator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_JITTER_POSITION_GENERATOR: Shape within which the effect positions are created.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_COLLIDE_SOUND_TAG_COMBO: The selected sound to play upon collsion.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_ORBITOR_AFFECTVELOCITY: Indicates that the velocity should also be rotated with the particle.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_ORBITOR_ANGULARVELOCITY: Angular velocity of the orbit in degrees per second.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_AMP_TEXTURENAME: List of files on the folder specified in button Folder, and that are relevant to the specified renderer. You can drag and drop BMP, TGA and DDS files from the asset locator.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_TRAIL_STEPS: Number of times that the sprite will be drawn behind each particle, thus actually altering the length of the trail.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_JITTER_AFFECT_POSITION: Indicates that the jitter effect should be applied to the particles' positions.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_JITTER_AFFECT_VELOCITY: Indicates that the jitter effect should be applied to the particles' velocities.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_JITTER_VELOCITY_GENERATOR: Shape within which the velocity vectors are created.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_COLLIDE_ELASTICITY: Amount of bounce to apply to the particle when hitting the ground or other objects.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_COLLIDE_SOUND_PROJECT_LIST: The file that contains all the FMOD Designer content.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_COLLIDE_SOUND_GROUP_LIST: The virtual folder used to organise event data into hierarchies.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_COLLIDE_SOUND_NAME_LIST: The (sound) actions taken when audio is requested.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_COLLIDE_SOUND_IDX: Index of the sound to play upon collsion.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_COLLIDE_SOUND_TAG_DIRECTORY_: The current directory containing sound files.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_MESH_VISUALNAME: The Visual Exporter exported visual file to draw the mesh particles. You can drag and drop visuals from the asset locator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_POSITION_GENERATOR_SH: Toggles visibility of the area defined for the position generator, and of the 3D gizmos attached to its initial and final (if applicable) points.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_VELOCITY_GENERATOR_SH: Toggles visibility of the area defined for the velocity generator, and of the 3D gizmos attached to its initial and final (if applicable) points.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_MAGNET_MINDIST: Area around the magnet in which it will not exert force.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_POSITION_GENERATOR_X2: To x coordinate of the final point of the position generator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_POSITION_GENERATOR_Y2: To y coordinate of the final point of the position generator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_POSITION_GENERATOR_Z2: To z coordinate of the final point of the position generator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_VELOCITY_GENERATOR_X2: To x coordinate of the final point of the velocity generator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_VELOCITY_GENERATOR_Y2: To y coordinate of the final point of the velocity generator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_VELOCITY_GENERATOR_Z2: To z coordinate of the final point of the velocity generator.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_AMP_CIRCULAR: Indicates that the sprites should be drawn connecting each particle to the next, instead of connecting each particle to the point of origin.
en.RCS_IDC_ADD: Add a new particle system or a new sub-particle system.
en.RCS_IDC_ADD_COMP: Add the selected componet to the current sub-particle system.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_SPRITE_FRAMECOUNT: Number of parts in which to cut the source file.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_SPRITE_FRAMERATE: Number of frames to display per second.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_BARRIER_REACTION: How the particles should interact with the barrier.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_TINTSHADER_FOG_BLEND: The amount of the fog colour to blend in with the tint colour (0.0 - 1.0).
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_TINTSHADER_PICKER_GREEN: Green component of the tint in the selected Time Point.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_TINTSHADER_PICKER_BLUE: Blue component of the tint in the selected Time Point.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_TINTSHADER_PICKER_ALPHA: Numeric value for the alpha to be applied to the particle in the selected Time Point.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_TINTSHADER_PICKER_RED: Red component of the tint in the selected Time Point.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_MOTIONTRIGGERED: Indicates that the particle subsystem is attached to a moving object.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_TIMETRIGGERED: Indicates that the particle sub-systems will periodically generate particles.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_GROUNDED: Indicates that particles should (if possible) be spawned at ground level.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_DROPDISTANCE: Maximum distance (in metres) allowed between the ground and the particle's initial height (specified in field Initial Position Generator-From-y) if the particle is to begenerated.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_RATE: Number of particles to be generated per second.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_BLUR_TEXTURENAME_DIR: Browse for a folder containing blur textures.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_BLUR_TEXTURENAME: List of files on the folder specified in button Folder, and that are relevant to the specified renderer. You can drag and drop BMP, TGA and DDS files from the asset locator.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_BLUR_WIDTH: Thickness with which to draw the image in source file.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_BLUR_TIME: How long to extend the particle back along its current velocity vector.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_RANDOM_SPIN_MIN: Minimum values allowed for the randomisation of the number of revolutions per second that the particle should perform.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_RANDOM_SPIN_MAX: Maximum values allowed for the randomisation of the number of revolutions per second that the particle should perform.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_INITIALORIENT_X: Pitch of the initial position of the particles.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_INITIALORIENT_Y: Yaw of the initial position of the particles.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_INITIALORIENT_RANDOMI: Maximum value to be used for randomising the particles' pitch.
Maximum value to be used for randomising the particles' yaw.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_FORCE_X: X component of the direction/magnitude of the force to be applied to the particles in the subsystem.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_FORCE_Y: Y component of the direction/magnitude of the force to be applied to the particles in the subsystem.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_FORCE_Z: Z component of the direction/magnitude of the force to be applied to the particles in the subsystem.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_STREAM_VECTORY: Y coordinate for the direction/magnitude of the force to be applied to the particles.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_STREAM_VECTORX: X coordinate for the direction/magnitude of the force to be applied to the particles.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_STREAM_VECTORZ: Z coordinate for the direction/magnitude of the force to be applied to the particles.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_STREAM_HALFLIFE: Number of seconds that the particle's velocity will take to move halfway towards the
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SCALER_RATE: Number of metres per seconds by which to increase or decrease the particle.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_ORBITOR_POINTZ: Z coordinate of the point around which the particles will orbit along the y-axis.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_ORBITOR_POINTX: X coordinate of the point around which the particles will orbit along the y-axis.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_FLARE_FLARESTEP: Frequency in which to apply the flare effect to the particles.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_TRAIL_TEXTURENAME: List of files on the folder specified in button Folder, and that are relevant to the specified renderer. You can drag and drop BMP, TGA and DDS files from the asset locator.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_SPRITE_TEXTURENAME_D: Browse for a folder containing sprite textures.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_TINTSHADER_ADDNEWTINT: Adds a new Time Point in the Tint Timeline.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_TRAIL_WIDTH: Thickness with which to draw the image in source file.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_AMP_WIDTH: Thickness with which to draw the image in source file.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_AMP_HEIGHT: How compressed or elongated the original texture will be when rendering the particle.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_AMP_STEPS: Number of kinks in each line.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_AMP_VARIATION: How much to bend each line.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_FLARE_COLOURIZE: Uses the setting specified for the component TintShader (if any) to colour the particles.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_FLARE_USEPARTICLESIZE: Indicates that the flare should be the same size as the particle it is attached to.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_FLARE_FLARENAME_DIRECTORY_ED: Folder from which to list the flare effect files.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_WORLDDEPENDENT: Sets if the particle system should be drawn in the world's coordinate system.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_LOCALDEPENDENT: Sets if the particle system should be drawn in the local coordinate system instead of the world's coordinate system.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_VIEWDEPENDENT: Sets if the particle system should be drawn in the camera's coordinate system instead of the world's coordinate system.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_SPRITE_MATERIALFX: List of available modes to blend the particle.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_SPRITE: A sprite is a bitmap that rotates to face the camera perspective.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_MESH: Uses a Visual Exporter exported mesh (.visual file) as a particle.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_BLUR: Draws a trail behind each particle, based on its velocity, but does not retain information about previous positions of each particle.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_AMP: Draws a series of sprites from the particle system's origin to each particle. Ideal for electrial effects.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_TRAIL: Draws a trail behind each particle, while retaining information about previous positions of each particle, allowing you to use centrifugal forces like Orbitor.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_VISUAL: Uses a generic visual (.visual) file to draw the particles.
en.RCS_IDS_PROMPTSAVE: The current particle system has been edited. Do you want to save your changes?
en.RCS_IDS_READONLY: The particle system "%0" is read only. Changes made to this particle system will not be saved.
en.RCS_IDB_SEARCHFILTER: Filter the list of particle systems.
en.RCS_IDC_FILTER: Search filter. Type the partial name of a particle system to filter the list.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_SPRITE_TEXTURENAME_D: The currently chosen directory for sprite textures. You can drag and drop BMP, TGA and DDS files from the asset locator.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_AMP_TEXTURENAME_DIRE: The currently chosen directory for amp textures. You can drag and drop BMP, TGA and DDS files from the asset locator.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_TRAIL_TEXTURENAME_DI: The currently chosen directory for trail textures. You can drag and drop BMP, TGA and DDS files from the asset locator.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_BLUR_TEXTURENAME_DIR: The currently chosen directory for blur textures. You can drag and drop BMP, TGA and DDS files from the asset locator.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_MESH_VISUALNAME_DIRE: The currently chosen directory for meshes. You can drag and drop visuals from the asset locator.
en.RCS_IDC_PSA_SOURCE_VELOCITY_INHERITANCE: Percentage of velocity inherited from particle system (0 for none, 1 for all).
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_MESH_MATERIAL_OVERRI: If this is checked, and if a material is selected below then the mesh's visual will use the overridden material instead.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_MESH_MATERIAL_DIRECT: Browse to select a material folder.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_MESH_SORT: The sorting applied to the particles before drawing.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_VISUAL_VISUALNAME: The visual file to draw the particles. You can drag and drop visuals from the asset locator.
en.RCS_IDC_PS_RENDERER_VISUAL_VISUALNAME_DI: The currently chosen directory for visuals. You can drag and drop visuals from the asset locator.
Browse for a folder containing visuals.
en.RCS_IDS_COULDNTOPENFILE: The file %0 could not be opened.
en.RCS_IDS_INVALIDFILENAME: The filename includes invalid characters. Characters such as "/<>?*:." or spaces are not allowed.
